ygData.subject: Re: At level 13 killing sand giants and hill giants.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve heard they made a change to the lifetap line of spells, they can now be resisted, in which case this plan might not work all that well against a 35th lvl
ygData.messageBody:
I've heard they made a change to the lifetap line of spells, they can now be
resisted, in which case this plan might not work all that well against a
35th lvl mob :)


> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> HE HE!! if that didnt get your attion you have a problem. Lats night we
were
> killing giants and spector's. My god I felt like a demi-god. We were 18
> necromancer's strong. All with pet's. We would see a giant and count it
down
> 5,4,3,2,1 and them all at the same time sick are pets on it. Then we would
> suck its life away. emguling darkness and heat blood do nothing, 18
necro's
> sucking hp out of a giant sends it too its knees befor it can kill 1/3 of
> the pets. My god this is a good way to make plat. type /who all
necromancer
> and then msg them all and get your own group together and bring fear to
all
> of norrath. That the necromancer is the true demastration of Innoruuk's
> blessing and POWER!!!!
>
